Indian Railway Finance Corporation (IRFC) tumbled 5.39% to Rs 33.35 on profit selling after recent steep gains.
Shares of IRFC surged 27.95% in the past seven sessions.

articles.title: Discoms' outstanding dues dip by Rs 24,689 cr to Rs 1,13,269 cr in last 6 months: Power Min - Economic Times
articles.description: The Ministry of Power on Wednesday said outstanding dues of electricity distribution firms (discoms) towards gencos, transcos and traders have come down by Rs 24,680 crore to Rs 1,13,269 crore in the last six months.
